### Matplotlib output to JSON heatmap

<heatmap
 file='{"path": "data/symmetric_matrix.json", "format": "json"}'
size='{"width":500,"height":500}'
colors='deep'
interp='"rgb"'
> </heatmap>








<table>
  <tr>
    <td>
